chapter.title: OpenAM Policy Agent Compatibility
chapter.para: This chapter covers both major changes to existing functionality, and also deprecated and removed functionality.

section.title: Web Policy Agent Compatibility
section.para: This section covers OpenAM Web Policy Agents .

section.title: Major Changes to Web Policy Agent Functionality
section.para: Naming URL validation was introduced after release 3.0.4. The initial implementation of naming URL validation for web policy agents enabled validation by default. Naming URL validation is now fully disabled by default. You can adjust this setting by using the bootstrap configuration property, com.forgerock.agents.ext.url.validation.disable.
